thread.title: Al Golden will not be evaluated until after season
thread.title_full: Al Golden will not be evaluated until after season

author: Grey Papke
title: Al Golden will not be evaluated until after season
text:
Al Golden will not be evaluated until after season Larry Brown Sports 15 hrs ago Grey Papke © Joe Robbins/Getty Images Al Golden's job is apparently safe through the end of the season. Miami head coach Al Golden is not a popular figure among Hurricanes fans, but it seems that they’ll have to put up with him for at least the remainder of the season.
AdChoices Miami athletic director Blake James reiterated on Saturday that no decision on Golden’s future will be taken until after the season, when he will be fully evaluated, according to the Sun Sentinel .
“Again, the thing you have to look at is if you lose [Saturday night], how many games are left?” James said. “And you win all the rest of your games? That’s why I think you always have to evaluate at the end of the year.”
Miami fans will surely be unhappy with this, as banners calling for the firing of the deeply unpopular coach have been regular fixtures over Hurricanes games this season. His tenure has been marked by a lack of major victories and no conference championships. On Saturday, Miami lost to Florida State for the sixth consecutive time.
